subject: Hello Eliza Dane
body:
Hello  Eliza Dane


This is to acknowledge the receipt of your mail. You were among the
beneficiaries selected through "EMAIL RANDOM SELECTION" to benefit from the
financial grant.

We have started all necessary documentations towards the release of your
United Nations Development financial grants of US$2, 500,000. You are to
choose out of the payment option on how you want to receive your funds.

Our duty is to process and release your funds to you through any payment
option below which you have chosen from.

You are to scan and send your means of identification  for proper
documentation towards the immediate release of the US$2.5M
dollars.

We have three payment options through which you can receive your fund

(1) Security Cash Delivery
(2) Atm card Payment
(3) Bank Draft

You are advised to act fast as we have stipulated time to complete this
payment exercise. Attached is my working ID to enable you to know who you
are dealing with.
Best Regards,

Mrs Jean George,
Funds Release Processing Officer
UNDP Grant Programm

subject: Re: Hello Eliza Dane
body:
Dear Mrs. Jean George,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am interested in this financial grant from the United Nations. However, before proceeding further, I would like to know more about this program and how I was selected.

Also, could you please provide more details about the three payment options? What are the procedures and requirements for each of them?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Derek

subject: Re: Hello Eliza Dane
body:
Attn: Eliza Dane,

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your mail. You were among the
beneficiaries selected through "EMAIL RANDOM SELECTION" to benefit from the
financial grant for the year 2024.

The United Nations office came up with the idea of this financial grant,
after the Covid-19 problem that made so many people to stay away from work
and that brought poverty to the world. Hence, this financial grant is to
aid individuals recover from their financial losses and  Poverty
Alleviation.

The three payment options are the way we intend to release your US$2.5M
dollars to you. You are not paying for the funds release processing.

It is Our duty to process and release your funds to you through any payment
option of your choice. You will be required to come down and collect your
funds immediately. We release your funds through any payment option that
you choose.

(1) Security Cash Delivery
(2) Atm card Payment
(3) Bank Draft

You are advised to act fast as we have stipulated time to complete this
payment exercise. You should forward your means of identification.
Best Regards,

Mrs Jean George,
Funds Release Processing Officer
UNDP Grant Programm

subject: Re: Hello Eliza Dane
body:
Attn: Eliza Dane,
We do not have much time with the payment exercise. You should choose which
payment option that you want.

(1) Security Cash Delivery
(2) Atm card Payment
(3) Bank Draft

You should forward your means of identification.
Best Regards,

Mrs Jean George,
Funds Release Processing Officer
UNDP Grant Programm

subject: Re: Hello Eliza Dane
body:
Dear Mrs. Jean George,

Thank you for your prompt response. I would prefer the Bank Draft payment option. Please let me know the next steps in this process.

Best wishes,
Derek

subject: Re: Hello Eliza Dane
body:
Attn: Eliza Dane,

We have directed the paying bank to start processing your financial grant
into Certified Bank Draft.

You will be notified immediately the bank draft is ready.

Confirm the receipt of this mail.
Best Regards,

Mrs Jean George,
Funds Release Processing Officer
UNDP Grant Programm

subject: Attn: David
body:

This is to acknowledge the receipt of your mail. You were among the

The United Nations office came up with the idea of this financial grant,

subject: Re: Hello Eliza Dane
body:
Dear Mrs. Jean George,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I am interested in this financial grant from the United Nations. However, I would like to know more about how I was selected and what the grant is intended for.

Regarding the payment options, could you please provide more details on each? Specifically, I would like to understand any fees associated with these methods and how quickly the funds can be transferred.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Derek

subject: Re: Hello Eliza Dane
body:
Attn: Eliza Dane,

Congratulations, we have good news for you. The processing of your US$2.5M
dollars into an Certified Bank Draft has been completed and your Atm card
is now ready for collection.

Attached is a scanned copy of your processed Certified Bank Draft. Let us
know when you would like to come down to our office and pick up your
processed Certified Bank Draft.

United Nations Office,
350 Lincoln Rd 2nd FL,
Miami Beach, FLorida 33139,
United States

In the alternative, if you cannot come, you can make use of the courier
delivery services to deliver your Certified Bank Draft to you and you take
care of the little delivery charges. The decision is yours.

We await your response.
Best regards,

Mrs Jean George,
Chairman UNDP Grant Programm
